rooms.description: Minimalist entrance with ample natural light and open space to accommodate the irregular plot shape. Features a Vastu-compliant south-east corner for positive energy.

Open-plan living area that seamlessly transitions into the kitchen. Includes seating area, entertainment system zone, and a minimalist decor. Positioned in the north-west section to maintain harmony with the sun's movement.
Integrated open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Equipped with modern minimalistic design, efficient storage solutions and natural lighting from a large window facing east.

Modular dining zone within the open-plan living space. Flexible seating arrangements for both casual and formal gatherings. Aligned with the Vastu principle of having dining space away from kitchen to maintain energy balance.

Dedicated home office located in a quiet corner of the ground floor, preferably in the north-west section for concentration and productivity. Minimalist design with ample workspace and storage solutions.
Spacious guest room featuring an adjoining balcony offering natural light and fresh air. Vastu alignment recommends positioning the guest room towards the south-east to invite positivity.
Primary bedroom with a private balcony, designed for restful sleep and relaxation. Oriented towards the east for early morning sunlight.
Secondary bedroom featuring an expansive balcony. Aligned to the north-east corner for balance in energy flow.
Additional bedroom with a dedicated balcony, designed to maximize privacy and comfort while ensuring proper sunlight exposure.
Optional study area integrated within the open-plan living space if additional workspace is needed. Designed for flexibility in usage.
Opulent master bedroom with a private balcony. Vastu recommends east-facing for serenity and abundant natural light.
Modern en-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, designed to offer convenience and privacy.
Additional bedroom with a balcony. Positioned in accordance with Vastu principles for balanced energy flow.
Another bedroom featuring a dedicated balcony. Aligned to south-east for maintaining positive energies.
Sixth bedroom integrated within the first floor plan, ensuring all rooms are well ventilated and naturally lit.
Shared bathroom facility on the first floor to cater for guest usage. Designed with minimalistic fixtures and ample storage.
